body_html:
Hi @ebrevdo ,
Excuse me for this rookie question.
How do I find the gradient implementation of tf.edit_distance (or any other op) ?

I added the tensor returned by tf.edit_distance to the traditional cross entropy loss, and can see that it is possible to pass this to an optimiser. The aim is to obtain an implementation that is conformant with Google's paper https://arxiv.org/abs/1712.01818

Thank you
